content:
reported by the GSG. This can be used to limit the amount of
multitexturing Panda will attempt to use. If this is zero or less, the
GSG will report its honest number of texture stages, allowing Panda the
full use of the graphics card; if it is 1 or more, then Panda will never
allow more than this number of texture stages simultaneously, regardless
of what the GSG says it can do. merge-lod-bundles bool 1 min-lag double 0.0 This represents the time in seconds by which to artificially lag
inbound messages. It is useful to test a game's tolerance of network
latency. min-occlusion-vertices int 300 The minimum number of vertices a PandaNode or Geom must contain in
order to perform an occlusion query for it. Nodes and Geoms smaller than
this will be rendered directly, without bothering with an occlusion
